5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“One prayer in my mosque is better than one thousand prayers elsewhere, except the Sacred Mosque, and one prayer in the Sacred Mosque is better than one hundred thousand prayers elsewhere.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَمَسْجِدِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the virtue of praying in the Sacred Mosque and the Mosque of the Prophet (ﷺ)
